descriptionlist.description:
Compatible with iPhone 4S/5/5C/5S/6/6+/6S/6S+ on iOS 7.0 - 9.02

Record any Phone Call or VoIP Call (speaker or microphone, except iPhone 4S) on your device without using an external call service.

Supports: Phone/Voip Calls, Viber, Skype, FaceTime, Line, Music App, YouTube, Spotify, Radio, etc,..

Call Recorder App: Play/Delete/Share your recordings and quickly setup Activator gestures.

Internal Web Server allows to easily access all your recordings from your personal computer and directly download, delete or play them from the device.

Skype/Viber & CallBar Support: Adds a quick record button directly into the call view.

Google Drive: Every recording will be automatically uploaded to your Google Drive account when you finish recording.

Activator Support: Toggle recording by Triple clicking the home button (or set other Activator gesture from the inside the application settings).

* This tweak only works on iPhone 4S/5/5C/5S/6/6+/6S/6S+ with iOS 7 and up.
on iPhone 4S it only works while playing through the external Speaker.

** In some countries it's illegal to perform a recording without the other party acknowledgement. Call Recorder can play a beep sound every 20 seconds to notify the other party of a recording taking place (You can disable/enable beeping from the application). Yaniv Danan (aka @hAcx) cannot be held responsible for any illegal use of this application and by installing this application you confirm that you take full responsibility on actions performed by this application **
